shortdesc.ph: Callback to report transport layer statistics for each remote audio stream.
Reports transport-layer statistics of each remote audio stream.

section.p: This callback reports transport layer statistics, such as packet loss rate and network delay after the local user receives audio packets from a remote user. It is triggered every 2 seconds during a call.
This callback reports transport-layer statistics of remote audio streams, such as packet loss rate and network delay after the local user receives audio packets from a remote user.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: During a call, triggered every 2 seconds when the local user receives audio packets from a remote user.
This callback is triggered every 2 seconds during the call when the local user receives audio packets from a remote user.
